Introduction

O21 (O To One) (Korean: 오투원) was a South Korean-Chinese girl group under Houxiu TV and FNC China. They debuted on June 20, 2016 with the single "Show Me". They disbanded in 2017 due to the THAAD issue.

Current state:
disbanded

Jun 20, 2016-Dec 31, 2017
